ACT
79
Proportional reduction of disposal by will Privileged record (legacy)
Will dispositions are reduced in the same proportion, regardless of their nature and scope, and regardless of whether they are in one or more wills, unless something else emerges from the will.
If the testator left several notes and ordered that one note be filled before the others, that note will be reduced only if the value of the other notes does not reach to settle the necessary part.
